# fractals

[demo](https://editor.p5js.org/datavorous314/full/0L2M-FHSb)

![chinese_fractal](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9d960f61-4815-4a7b-a388-a71efb3cccfe)

## code 

```js
// color palettes generated by LLMs

let palette_green = [
  '#0B3D02', // Forest Green (darkest)
  '#145A07', // Woodland Green
  '#1E7510', // Pine Green
  '#298F19', // Emerald Green
  '#34AA22', // Kelly Green
  '#53BA48', // Fern Green
  '#7ACB7B', // Mint Green
  '#A1DDB0', // Tea Green
  '#C8EFE5', // Honeydew
  '#E7F9F0'  // Pale Mint (lightest)
];

let palette_red = [
  '#2B0000', // Black Cherry (darkest)
  '#4C0000', // Deep Maroon
  '#6D0000', // Crimson Red
  '#8E0000', // Firebrick
  '#AF0000', // Scarlet
  '#D00000', // Vermilion
  '#E35151', // Light Coral
  '#F67272', // Salmon Pink
  '#FAB1A0', // Misty Rose
  '#FFECEC'  // Rosewater (lightest)
];

let palette_cyberpunk = [
  '#1A001F', // Midnight Purple (darkest)
  '#350035', // Deep Magenta
  '#590059', // Vivid Indigo
  '#7A00FF', // Ultra Violet
  '#D400FF', // Electric Magenta
  '#FF007F', // Neon Pink
  '#FF3F3F', // Vivid Red
  '#FFAA00', // Bright Amber
  '#FFE500', // Cyber Yellow
  '#E5FF00'  // Electric Lime (lightest)
];


let palette_chinese = [
  '#C41E3A', // Imperial Red
  '#FFD700', // Golden Yellow
  '#006B3C', // Jade Green
  '#5C4033', // Wenge Brown
  '#8B0000', // Dark Red
  '#FFC1A1', // Porcelain Peach
  '#001F3F', // Deep Lapis
  '#F5F5DC', // Bamboo Silk
  '#DAA520', // Temple Gold
  '#3E2723'  // Ebony
];

let palette_siberia = [
  '#F0F8FF', // Alice Blue Ice
  '#E0F7FA', // Ice Blue
  '#B0C4DE', // Light Steel Blue
  '#778899', // Cold Grey
  '#FFFFFF', // Pure Snow
  '#AEC6CF', // Frosted Sky
  '#36454F', // Gunmetal
  '#1F3B4D', // Deep Fjord
  '#D3D3D3', // Mist Silver
  '#002E4D'  // Arctic Night
];

//let p = 0.1;

let maxIter = 10;
let zoom = 1;
// these are the values of constant(c) in the expression
let cx = 0.31666;
let cy = -0.43333;
//let a_prev = 1;
//let b_prev = 1;
function setup() {
  createCanvas(220, 220);
  //slider = createSlider(-1, 1, 0.3166);
  sliderCX = createSlider(-2, 2, cx, 0.0001);
  sliderCX.position(10, height + 10);

  sliderCY = createSlider(-2, 2, cy, 0.0001);
  sliderCY.position(10, height + 40);
  
  pixelDensity(1);
  //noLoop();
}

function draw() {
  cx = sliderCX.value();
  cy = sliderCY.value();
  background(0);
  loadPixels(); // loading the pixel array 
  //https://p5js.org/reference/p5/map/ 
  //[0, something] -> [-1, 1]
  //cx = map(mouseX, 0, width, -1, 1);
  //cy = map(mouseY, 0, height, -1, 1);
  //console.log("Point: "+mouseX+", "+mouseY+"and "+cx+", "+cy);
  loop();

  for (let x = 0; x < width; x++) {
    for (let y = 0; y < height; y++) {
      // mapping pixel to complex plane:
      let a = map(x, 0, width, -zoom, zoom);
      // mapping all x from [0, width] -> [-zoom, zoom]
      let b = map(y, 0, height, -zoom, zoom);
      
      // initial z = a + ib
      let ca = a;
      let cb = b;
      
      let n = 0;
      while (n < maxIter) {
        // z = z^2 + c  ->  (a+ib)^2 + (cx+icy)
        let aa = a*a - b*b + cx;
        let bb = 2*a*b + cy;
        a = aa;
        b = bb;
        
        // (z -> conj(z)Â² + c)
        // let aa =  a*a - b*b + cx;
        // let bb = -2*a*b + cy; // note the negation here
        // a = aa; 
        // b = bb;
        
        if (a * a + b * b > 4) break;
        n++;
      }
      
      // mapping val of n with the index in the color palette
      let idx = floor(map(n, 0, maxIter, 0, palette_cyberpunk.length - 1));
      let col = color(palette_cyberpunk[idx]);
      let pix = (x + y * width) * 4;
      pixels[pix] = red(col);
      pixels[pix+1] = green(col);
      pixels[pix+2] = blue(col);
      pixels[pix+3] = 255;
    }
  }
  
  updatePixels();
}
```
